mapper.insert: insert into codeworld_product_detail ( t_product_id, t_product_desc, t_product_generic_param, t_product_special_param, t_product_packing_list, t_product_after_service, t_product_create_time, t_product_update_time ) values ( #{id}, #{desc}, #{genericParam}, #{specialParam}, #{packingList}, #{afterService}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} );
mapper.select: select cpd.t_product_desc AS 'desc', cpd.t_product_special_param AS specialParam, cpd.t_product_packing_list AS packingList, cpd.t_product_after_service AS afterService, cpd.t_product_generic_param AS genericParam from codeworld_product_detail AS cpd where cpd.t_product_id = #{productId}
